item.title: Generating Signals, Backgrounds and Wavelets
item.description: This is a short technical tutorial to get quickly into configuring signals, backgrounds and wavelets using the Signal Generator. Make sure before starting that you have completed the project setup/update as presented in the project’s README. up and running Lets run the management app: $ make web Visit the management app: http://127.0.0.1:5000/ As you can see under the signals, background and wavelets tabs there is a configuration that is presented by default.
